cockatrice_carddatabase.cards:
Aerial Grace AYR W 1W 2 Enchantment 1 At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gains flying and vigilance until end of turn.
Alone in the World AYR W 3WW 5 Sorcery 3 Destroy all creatures, then create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
Aven Acrobat AYR W 1W 2 Creature - Bird Wizard 1/2 2 Flying Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn’t renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
Daring Strike AYR W 2W 3 Instant 3 Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn. If it’s renowned, untap it.
Dashing Swordsman AYR W W 1 Creature - Human Soldier 1/1 2 First strike Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn’t renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

Evanescing Chord AYR W W 1 Instant 3 Exile target creature you control. Return that card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step. Resonance 2W (If you cast this spell for 2W, exile it as it resolves. As you cast your next instant or sorcery spell, put this card into your graveyard and you may add its effects and colors to that spell.)
Inspiring March AYR W 1W 2 Instant 3 Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Resonance 3W (If you cast this spell for 3W, exile it as it resolves. As you cast your next instant or sorcery spell, put this card into your graveyard and you may add its effects and colors to that spell.)

Mystical Minstrel AYR W 1W 2 Creature - Human Bard 1/3 2 Virtuoso — Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
Peaceful Thoughts AYR W 2W 3 Instant 3 Exile target attacking creature, blocking creature, or enchantment. Its controller gains 4 life.

As you cast your next instant or sorcery spell, put this card into your graveyard and you may add its effects and colors to that spell.)
